text: The following is an overview of 2014 in Chinese music. ==Events== *ABU TV Song Festival 2014 (October 25) ==TV shows== *I Am a Singer (Chinese Season 2) (January 3 – April 11) *Sing My Song (season 1) (January 3 – March 21) ==Awards== *2014 ERC Chinese Top Ten Awards (zh) *2014 Global Chinese Golden Chart Awards *2014 Global Chinese Music Awards *2014 Migu Music Awards *2014 MTV Europe Music Awards Best Chinese & Hong Kong Act: Bibi Zhou *2014 MTV Europe Music Awards Best Southeast Asia, China, Hong Kong & Taiwan Act: Bibi Zhou *2014 QQ Music Awards *2014 Top Chinese Music Awards *The 2nd V Chart Awards *2014 Music Radio China Top Chart Awards ==Releases== ===First quarter=== ====March==== {| class="wikitable" |+ !
